MESSAGE: Flumpty: Flumpty will make his way from the stage to Cam 9, he will try to turn off the office power, give him a controlled shock to send him back.
The Redman: He will cause a warning to appear on your monitor, cancel it before it before he jumpscares you.

QUESTION: Choose a number between 0-20 and all enemies will be changed to that diffculty. (the lower the number the easier)

sounds.name: You Can Hide but you can't hide

SOUND_MENU: Now would be a good time to hold your breath
Time to face the consequences of your failure
might as well face the facts
seeing you powerless is like music to me
that was easier than i thought it would be
Listen to my Voice and you will find the key
when you can see, how fast can you see?
You Can Hide but you can't hide
I guess you forgot about me
Want to see the scooping room?
It will all be over soon
I'm so glad I found you
Let's taste death again and again
I am the fearful reflection of what you have created
Soon you will look just like me
It's so much more fun hanging out in here with you
I wanted to wait until just the right moment to drop in
